alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 5:46AM AKST until February 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 6 inches is expected south of McKinley Village. North of the Denali Park entrance, expect south winds gusting around 60 mph with blowing snow. Plan on difficult travel conditions. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...3 PM today to 6 PM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 60 mph will cause snow and blowing snow issues through this morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
